org.xstuido.gue.view.cards.objects

类 RecyclableCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xstuido.gue.view.cards.objects.AbstractCard
      • org.xstuido.gue.view.cards.objects.Card
        • org.xstuido.gue.view.cards.objects.RecyclableCard
  • 直接已知子类:
    NothingToDoCard, SignInCard, ToDoCard, ToDoItemCard, WeatherCard

    public abstract class RecyclableCard
extends Card
    A card that can be recycled when scrolled off screen.

    • 方法详细资料

      • applyTo

        protected abstract void applyTo(android.view.View convertView)
        Set the values of child views. The view will not be null and is guaranteed to have the layout of the root element equal to the layout resource ID from getCardLayoutId().
        参数:
        convertView - non-null view to modify

      • getCardLayoutId

        protected abstract int getCardLayoutId()
        Get the R.layout ID of the root element of the content of the card. This value will be used to inflate the card and check whether an old card's View can be recycled.
        返回:
        layout ID of the card content

      • getCardContent

        public android.view.View getCardContent(android.content.Context context)
        指定者:
        getCardContent 在类中 Card

      • convert

        public boolean convert(android.view.View convertCardView)
        从类复制的说明: Card
        Attempt to reuse convertCardView. Should not modify convertCardView if it's not compatible. The implementer should check the card content part and verify that it matches.
        指定者:
        convert 在类中 Card
        参数:
        convertCardView - the view to convert, with root Id equal to Card.getId()
        返回:
        true on success, false if not compatible
